DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy GRT6005 Pain Due Diabetic Polyneuropathy
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 18 75 year old . Type 1 type 2 diabetes . Painful DPN symptom sign least 3 month . Blood glucose control medication . Glycosylated hemoglobin great 9.5 11 % , country dependent . Prior analgesic medication . Average score 4 great 11 point NRS last 3 day prior randomization . Impaired liver , cardiac renal function . Breastfeeding pregnancy . History substance abuse , alcohol medication . Chronic gastrointestinal disease . History seizures epilepsy . History presence malignancy . Presence painful medical condition due diabetic neuropathy , e.g . rheumatoid arthritis . Allergies opioids , acetaminophen excipients medication .
